analysis.description:
SmartPyramid.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#256-277) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_payout) (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#275)

SmartPyramid.payDay (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#291-308) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- top[i + 1].addr.transfer(2000000000000000000 / 2 ** i) (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#305-306)

Reentrancy in SmartPyramid.invest (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#236-255):
	External calls:
	- x.d(msg.sender) > 0 (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#241-242)
	- withdraw() (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#241-242)
	External calls sending eth:
	- admin.transfer(msg.value * 4 / 25) (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#238-240)
	- withdraw() (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#241-242)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- x (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#241-242)
SmartPyramid.bytesToAddress (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#187-193) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in SmartPyramid.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#256-277):
	External calls:
	- block.timestamp >= x.c(msg.sender) + 600 (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#259-268)
	- _payout = (x.d(msg.sender).mul(x.getInterest(msg.sender)).div(10000)).mul(block.timestamp.sub(x.c(msg.sender))).div(86400) (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#261-267)

	- x (/unique_contracts/0xa9fa841e2b56be2d8b645819b46fedfd9e331206.sol#273)
